message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. It's a unique opportunity to own a high-quality item that's worth $10000 to you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your life.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $9250. This price still reflects the value the product brings to you, and I believe it's a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $9200. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm thinking $9150 is a fair price for the product.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to go below $9200. I'm willing to make one more compromise, so I'll offer the product to you for $9175. This is as low as I can go, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the value the product brings to you.

I'll make one more compromise, so I'll offer the product to you for $9025. This is as low as I can go, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the value the product brings to you.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I've reached my limit. I'm willing to make one last offer of $9000 for the product. If you're not willing to accept this, I'll have to consider buying from John.
